name: Auto-Save Value
description: @AUTOSAVE action tags to trigger automatic saving of field values during data entry and/or on survey forms.

action-tags.description: Tag a text field with @AUTOSAVE to have the value saved automatically after its value is updated.
As @AUTOSAVE, but in data entry mode only, not in survey mode.
As @AUTOSAVE, but in survey mode only, not in data entry mode.
As @AUTOSAVE-FORM, but suppress the field's save icon where in data entry mode it would normally be shown.
As @AUTOSAVE-SURVEY, but show the field's save icon where in survey mode it would normally be suppressed.
